attributes.action: call a Referendum of the British people seeking that the United Kingdom leave the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The democratic will of the British people demands their God given Right to be heard, in this vital matter.

Please note:

Membership of the European Union is not a pre-requisite for sucessfull co-existance or for sucessful trading, and most certainly not a pre-requisite for a just and democratic society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
